README.md:
# __PROJECT_NAME__ - Assembly Project

## Supported Assemblers

- **NASM** (Netwide Assembler)
- **FASM** (Flat Assembler)
- **GAS** (GNU Assembler)
- **MASM** (Microsoft Macro Assembler)

## Build Examples

### Linux x86_64 (NASM)
```bash
nasm -f elf64 src/main.asm -o main.o
ld main.o -o main
./main
```

### Windows x64 (NASM)
```bash
nasm -f win64 src/main_win.asm -o main.obj
link main.obj /subsystem:console /entry:main
```

### Bootloader (NASM)
```bash
nasm -f bin src/boot.asm -o boot.bin
qemu-system-x86_64 -drive format=raw,file=boot.bin
```
src/main.asm:
; Linux x86_64 - NASM syntax
; Build: nasm -f elf64 main.asm -o main.o && ld main.o -o main

section .data
    msg db 'Hello, Assembly World!', 0xA
    len equ $ - msg

section .text
    global _start

_start:
    ; write(1, msg, len)
    mov rax, 1          ; sys_write
    mov rdi, 1          ; stdout
    mov rsi, msg        ; buffer
    mov rdx, len        ; length
    syscall

    ; exit(0)
    mov rax, 60         ; sys_exit
    xor rdi, rdi        ; status 0
    syscall
src/main_win.asm:
; Windows x64 - NASM syntax
; Build: nasm -f win64 main_win.asm -o main.obj && link main.obj /subsystem:console /entry:main

extern ExitProcess
extern GetStdHandle
extern WriteConsoleA

section .data
    msg db 'Hello, Assembly World!', 0xD, 0xA
    len equ $ - msg

section .bss
    written resq 1

section .text
    global main

main:
    sub rsp, 40         ; Shadow space + alignment

    ; GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE)
    mov rcx, -11
    call GetStdHandle

    ; WriteConsoleA(handle, msg, len, &written, NULL)
    mov rcx, rax        ; handle
    lea rdx, [msg]      ; buffer
    mov r8d, len        ; length
    lea r9, [written]   ; written
    mov qword [rsp+32], 0  ; reserved
    call WriteConsoleA

    ; ExitProcess(0)
    xor ecx, ecx
    call ExitProcess
src/boot.asm:
; Simple bootloader example - NASM
; Build: nasm -f bin boot.asm -o boot.bin
; Test: qemu-system-x86_64 -drive format=raw,file=boot.bin

BITS 16
ORG 0x7C00

start:
    ; Setup segments
    xor ax, ax
    mov ds, ax
    mov es, ax
    mov ss, ax
    mov sp, 0x7C00

    ; Print message
    mov si, msg
    call print_string

    ; Halt
    cli
    hlt

print_string:
    lodsb
    or al, al
    jz .done
    mov ah, 0x0E
    int 0x10
    jmp print_string
.done:
    ret

msg db 'Booting __PROJECT_NAME__...', 0xD, 0xA, 0

times 510-($-$$) db 0
dw 0xAA55
Makefile:
# Assembly Project Makefile

.PHONY: all clean linux windows boot

all: linux

linux:
	nasm -f elf64 src/main.asm -o main.o
	ld main.o -o main

windows:
	nasm -f win64 src/main_win.asm -o main.obj
	link main.obj /subsystem:console /entry:main

boot:
	nasm -f bin src/boot.asm -o boot.bin

clean:
	rm -f *.o *.obj *.bin main main.exe
